017package org.hd.d.TRVmodel;
018
019import java.io.File;
020import java.io.FileWriter;
021import java.io.Writer;
022import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
023
024import org.hd.d.TRVmodel.hg.ShowComputations;
025
026/**Main (command-line) entry-point for the data handler.
027 */
028public final class Main
029    {
030    /**Print a summary of command options to stderr. */
031    private static void printOptions()
032        {
033        System.err.println("Commands/options");
034        System.err.println("  -help");
035        System.err.println("    This summary/help.");
036        System.err.println("  -hg");
037        System.err.println("    Show Heat Geek TRV/HP model and variants.");
038        System.err.println("  -htmltable XXX");
039        System.err.println("    Write HTML table XXX to out.html for debugging.");
040        System.err.println("    XXX can be one of: summary, summarySoft, sagSoft");
041        System.err.println("  -LaTeXtable XXX");
042        System.err.println("    Write LaTeX table XXX to out.html for debugging.");
043        System.err.println("    XXX can be one of: summary, summarySoft, sagSoft");
044       }
045
046    /**Default name of output file for HTML table generation; non-null. */
047    public static final File DEFAULT_OUTPUT_NAME_HTML = new File("out.html");
048
049    /**Default name of output file for LaTeX table generation; non-null. */
050    public static final File DEFAULT_OUTPUT_NAME_LaTeX = new File("out.tex");
051
052    /**Accepts command-line arguments.
053     * See {@link #printOptions()}.
054     */
055    public static void main(final String[] args)
056        {
057        if((args.length < 1) || "-help".equals(args[0]))
058            {
059            printOptions();
060            return; // Not an error.
061            }
062
063        // Command is first argument.
064        final String command = args[0];
065
066        try
067            {
068                if("-hg".equals(args[0]))
069                        {
070                        ShowComputations.showCalcs();
071                        System.exit(0);
072                        }
073
074                if("-htmltable".equals(args[0]) && (args.length > 1))
075                        {
076                        final String tableHTML;
077
078                        switch(args[1])
079                        {
080                        case "summary": tableHTML = ShowComputations.generateHTMLMainSummaryTable(true); break;
081                        case "summarySoft": tableHTML = ShowComputations.generateHTMLMainSummaryTable(false); break;
082                        case "sagSoft": tableHTML = ShowComputations.generateHTMLSagTable(); break;
083                        default:
084                                System.err.println("unknown table: " + args[1]);
085                        System.exit(1);
086                        return; // Should be unreachable.
087                        }
088
089                        // Write HTML bare, as UTF-8 (though should only be 7-bit ASCII).
090                        // Expects to overwrite any existing file.
091                        try (Writer w = new FileWriter(DEFAULT_OUTPUT_NAME_HTML, StandardCharsets.UTF_8))
092                                { w.write(tableHTML); }
093
094                        System.exit(0);
095                        }
096
097                if("-LaTeXtable".equals(args[0]) && (args.length > 1))
098                        {
099                        final String tableLaTeX;
100
101                        switch(args[1])
102                        {
103                        case "summary": tableLaTeX = ShowComputations.generateLaTeXMainSummaryTable(true); break;
104                        case "summarySoft": tableLaTeX = ShowComputations.generateLaTeXMainSummaryTable(false); break;
105//                      case "sagSoft": tableHTML = ShowComputations.generateHTMLSagTable(); break;
106                        default:
107                                System.err.println("unknown table: " + args[1]);
108                        System.exit(1);
109                        return; // Should be unreachable.
110                        }
111
112                        // Write HTML bare, as UTF-8 (though should only be 7-bit ASCII).
113                        // Expects to overwrite any existing file.
114                        try (Writer w = new FileWriter(DEFAULT_OUTPUT_NAME_LaTeX, StandardCharsets.UTF_8))
115                                { w.write(tableLaTeX); }
116
117                        System.exit(0);
118                        }
119
120            }
121        catch(final Throwable e)
122            {
123            System.err.println("FAILED command: " + command);
124            e.printStackTrace();
125            System.exit(1);
126            }
127
128        // Unrecognised/unhandled command.
129        System.err.println("Unrecognised or unhandled command: " + command);
130        printOptions();
131        System.exit(1);
132        }
133    }
